org.hermit.android.instruments
Class SpectrumGauge

java.lang.Object
  org.hermit.android.instruments.Gauge
      org.hermit.android.instruments.SpectrumGauge

public class SpectrumGauge
extends Gauge

A graphical display which displays the audio spectrum from an AudioAnalyser instrument. This class cannot be instantiated directly; get an instance by calling AudioAnalyser.getSpectrumGauge(SurfaceRunner).
